verses.verse: Behold <S%H7971><s%>, I send my <S%H4397>messenger<s%>, and he shall <S%H6437>prepare<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H113>me<s%>: and the Lord, whom ye <S%H1245>seek<s%>, will <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H1964>temple<s%>; and the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, whom ye <S%H2655>desire<s%>, <S%H935>behold<s%>, he cometh, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

And I will come <S%H7126>near<s%> to you to <S%H4941>judgment<s%>; and I will be a <S%H4116>swift<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against the <S%H3784>sorcerers<s%>, and against the <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>, and against the <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H7650>swearers<s%>, and against those that <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H7916>hireling<s%> in his <S%H7939>wages<s%>, the <S%H490>widow<s%>, and the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and that turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> from his <S%H3372>right<s%>, and fear not <S%H559>me<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
For <S%H3068>I<s%>, Jehovah, <S%H8138>change<s%> <S%H1121>not<s%>; therefore ye, O sons of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, are not <S%H3615>consumed<s%>.

Bring <S%H935><s%> ye the whole <S%H4643>tithe<s%> into the <S%H214>store-house<s%>, that there may be <S%H2964>food<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H974>prove<s%> me now <S%H2063>herewith<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, if I will not <S%H6605>open<s%> you the <S%H699>windows<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and pour you <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, that there shall not be room enough to receive <S%H1767>it<s%>.
